title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 3 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park Centennial Event - Savor Paterson - Great Falls, Great Food, Great Stories      Location: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park     Thursday, August 25, 2016 This signature event will be celebrated on August 25th, the 100th birthday of the National Park Service.  Savor Paterson will serve as a "block party" to celebrate Paterson's past, present and future as a multicultural city of immigrants. View Details      Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park Centennial Art in the Park Showcase       Location: Overlook Park - 72 McBride Avenue, Paterson, NJ Fees: Free     Friday, August 26, 2016 The Great Falls will provide the backdrop for the visual, literary and performing arts.  View Details      Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park Centennial BioBlitz at Paterson Great Falls      Location: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park     Saturday, August 27, 2016 Ever wondered what organisms called your park or town home? Now you can get the chance to find the answer.  View Details             .
